entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Corner Brook
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 02:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain in the morning then to flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
